author: L. Johnson

review: The fire TV is a game changer. I've had all kinds of streaming media boxes in the past, and this kills them all, including intel NUC's and most small HTPC's. The fact that you can easily install (including sideloading) any android app, makes this a real winner, and the features that come built in like voice search, x-ray for amazon content, etc, is great. There are a few more things I wish it could do. An audible and comixology app would be great, but that's nothing to do with the hardware, and hopefully they'll make their way there soon.
